revision.text:
<!--호텔_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Hotel
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 호텔명칭 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 위치 | ontologyProperty = location }}
	{{GeocoordinatesMapping | coordinates = 좌표 }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 개장 | ontologyProperty = openingDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 폐장 | ontologyProperty = closingDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 개발사 | ontologyProperty = developer }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 건축가 | ontologyProperty = architect }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 식당수 | ontologyProperty = numberOfRestaurants }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 객실수 | ontologyProperty = numberOfRooms }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 스위트수 | ontologyProperty = numberOfSuites }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 소유주 | ontologyProperty = owner }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 운영사 | ontologyProperty = tenant }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 층수 | ontologyProperty = floorCount }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 연면적 | ontologyProperty = floorArea | unit = Area }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 주차 | ontologyProperty = numberOfParkingSpaces }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 웹사이트 | ontologyProperty = foaf:homepage }}
end}}
<!-- Not Yet Mapping
    | 성급          =
  | 다이아몬드수  = 
-->
